WorkItem.Description:
When I put a point into Roar of Recovery near the bottom of the cunning pet tree and try to Switch to Pet Talents in the Comparaison Window it gives me an Unhandled Exception.
 
I've tried it both with just a single point in Roar of Recovery and in filling the tree properly to reach Roar of Recovery. Both give me the same error.
 
Index was outside the bounds of the array
************** Exception Text **************
System.IndexOutOfRangeException: Index was outside the bounds of the array.

hope this can help to fix it. :)
